name: cypress-bdd-TASK
description: This project is meant to be a kind of template to start working with Cucumber, Allure and Cypress

scripts.reports:clear: (if exist allure-results (rmdir /S /Q allure-results)) && (if exist allure-report (rmdir /S /Q allure-report)) && mkdir allure-results
scripts.test:smoke:allure: npx cypress run --env tags='@smoke' --env allure=true --browser chrome
scripts.test:allure:report: npm run reports:clear && npm run test:parabank:allure & npm run allure:generate && npm run allure:open
scripts.test:allure:serve: npm run reports:clear && npm run test:parabank:allure & npm run allure:generate && npm run allure:serve
scripts.test:smoke:report: npm run reports:clear && npm run test:smoke:allure && npm run allure:generate && npm run allure:open
scripts.test:cucumber-report: npm run test:parabank && npm run report:generate

author: Nifaanya
